2024.title: PyTorch Lightning
2024.description: High-level PyTorch framework that simplifies model training, scaling, and reproducibility.

2024.title: Hugging Face Transformers
2024.description: Extensive library of pre-trained NLP and generative models for Python and PyTorch.

2024.title: Weights & Biases (W&B)
2024.description: Experiment tracking and model management platform for reproducible machine learning workflows.

2024.title: DVC (Data Version Control)
2024.description: Version control system for datasets and machine learning models built on Git principles.

2024.title: Streamlit
2024.description: Framework for turning Python scripts into interactive web apps for data visualization and ML demos.

2024.title: Plotly
2024.description: Interactive graphing and analytics library for Python, R, and JavaScript.

2024.title: Optuna
2024.description: Automatic hyperparameter optimization software framework to accelerate model tuning.

2024.title: Ray
2024.description: Distributed computing framework for scaling Python workloads, useful for hyperparameter search and training.

2024.title: BentoML
2024.description: Model serving and deployment framework that packages ML models as production-ready APIs.

2024.title: Apache Airflow
2024.description: Platform to programmatically author, schedule, and monitor workflows, widely used for ML pipelines.

2024.title: Prefect
2024.description: Modern workflow orchestration for data and ML pipelines with a Python-native API.

2024.title: Great Expectations
2024.description: Open-source framework for validating, documenting, and profiling data to ensure quality.

2024.title: Evidently AI
2024.description: Tools for monitoring ML model quality and data drift in production.

2024.title: Apache Superset
2024.description: Modern data exploration and visualization platform for business intelligence workflows.

2024.title: Modin
2024.description: Drop-in replacement for pandas that enables parallel and distributed DataFrame processing.

2024.title: KServe
2024.description: Standardized server for deploying ML models on Kubernetes with autoscaling and inference features.
